name: Bob the Blob (OdeGames)
description:
Ripped from the safety of the laboratory and now alone for the first time in their life, Bob the Blob must explore treacherous new landscapes to re-unite with their best-friend and creator, the Scientist. But they can’t do it alone! 

Team up with a second blob with a mysterious past and embark on a journey of self-discovery to reunite with their maker. 

The blobs will need your help - split up to solve puzzles as a team or combine together as one mega-blob!  

Bob can’t wait to show the Scientist how much they’ve grown.
